author: bencomic

right.text: but as i was walking to the bathroom this girl was leaving her room and was locking it up i guess

left.text: so i left my dorm room to go take a leak, right

right.text: the problem was the bathroom was past her

left.text: and she saw me and waved and stood there like she was going to try to talk to me once i got up there

right.text: and i waited in there a few minutes to make sure she was gone and i sort of listened to make sure nobody was in the hall when i came out

left.text: so i gave her a sort of noncommittal half-wave and ducked intothe stairwell, which was immediately to my right

title: CREEPING DEATH 3 - COMES OUT OF STAIRWELL, STAYS IN CLOSET
